workouts.name: Draw from holster
workouts.description: Practice drawing your firearm from a holster and aiming at a target.

workouts.name: Draw from concealment
workouts.description: Practice drawing your firearm from a concealed position and aiming at a target.

workouts.name: Draw and fire 1 shot
workouts.description: Practice drawing your firearm and firing one shot at a target.

workouts.name: Draw and fire 2 shots
workouts.description: Practice drawing your firearm and firing two shots at a target.

workouts.name: Draw and fire 3 shots
workouts.description: Practice drawing your firearm and firing three shots at a target.

workouts.name: Draw and fire 5 shots
workouts.description: Practice drawing your firearm and firing five shots at a target.

workouts.name: Draw and fire 10 shots
workouts.description: Practice drawing your firearm and firing ten shots at a target.

workouts.name: Draw and fire 15 shots
workouts.description: Practice drawing your firearm and firing fifteen shots at a target.

workouts.name: Draw and fire 20 shots
workouts.description: Practice drawing your firearm and firing twenty shots at a target.

workout_groups.name: Gun Draw & Holster
workout_groups.description: Practice drawing, re-holstering, and transitioning between ready and secure positions.

workouts.name: Draw from holster (slow)
workouts.description: Practice drawing your firearm from a holster slowly and smoothly.

workouts.name: Draw from holster (standard speed)
workouts.description: Practice drawing your firearm from a holster at a normal pace.

workouts.name: Draw from holster (quick draw)
workouts.description: Practice a quick draw from the holster and assume a firing position.

workouts.name: Draw and holster (slow)
workouts.description: Draw and re-holster your firearm with deliberate control.

workouts.name: Draw and holster (standard speed)
workouts.description: Draw and re-holster your firearm at a comfortable speed.

workouts.name: Draw and holster (quick holster)
workouts.description: Practice a quick draw and a rapid yet controlled re-holster.

workouts.name: Draw, fire 1 shot, and holster
workouts.description: Draw your firearm, fire one shot, and re-holster safely.

workouts.name: Draw, fire 2 shots, and holster
workouts.description: Draw your firearm, fire two shots, and re-holster efficiently.

workouts.name: Draw, fire 3 shots, and holster
workouts.description: Draw, fire three shots, and re-holster your firearm smoothly.

workouts.name: Draw, fire 5 shots, and holster
workouts.description: Draw, fire five rapid shots, and holster with precision.
